values:
I just realized that I should post that this journal is indeed closed and has been since May or whenever that last post was.

This journal is full of things that are no longer a part of me.

It was a weird transition that, thankfully, is over now.

Thanks to you guys that have been around.  I hope you are all well.

Take care!

I will never understand the pleasure that some people receive from hurting others.


Never.

If it builds you up to *attempt* to bring others down - you really do not possess the ability to stand too high anyway.

<small>(no i'm not here anymore - but i felt a desire to leave a little something)</small>

If I'm dead to you - then please... let me be dead.


It is all dead to me.



I am all dead to it.



I said goodbye.


And whoever else may happen this way - again, goodbye.

If people are not out to hurt me and they don't care about the mistakes I've made that don't affect them at all...

Then why in the world would they decide to round up all the haters and go to town.



No drama?


Please.


No drama is just disappearing.  I haven't made any posts about anyone - where this hatred came from I don't know.


A situation - at least from the people who called me today - is over.


You can always just stop being someone's friend without being a horrible hateful bitch hellbent on making your opinions known to people who frankly, if they are better than you, probably don't really give a damn anyway.


Why can't people just leave me alone when they decide to leave me alone?



Grown up?  Grown up is not involving everyone you know and don't know in your current tirade.  


Love?  Right.



That's all I have to say.  And congrats - you want to hurt?  You win.

People who matter are most aware that everyone else does, too.


-  Malcolm Forbes

Remember that meme I went nuts about awhile ago?? I revisited it since I've been posting a lot more since the last time I tried it.
LiveJournal Haiku!
Your name:ever_searching
Your haiku:be pondering may
bring up for you or you or
you or you or you
Username:
Created by Grahame
I think I may add that one to my bio page... What do you think? EDIT: OK - so I refreshed a few times (couldn't help it) - my journal is extrememly interesting (yet in somewhat an even more vague way) with this thing... Interesting... extremely... Yes - I'm an overthinking introspective dork.

I did some more cleaning of the list...


Again - nothing to "hide" - but I do go into a lot of raw emotion/thought that I do hold dear and like to keep SAFE.


I've had conversation recently with someone about how a lot of what I write is hard to understand because its not straight-forward, "today i blah blah blah", or i speak of the outcome without explaning the initial circumstance (which to me... is often unimportant anyway).


so please check... if i've removed you and your cool with it - please do the same...


if i did and i shouldn't have... just let me know.

We shall find peace. We shall hear the angels. We shall see the sky sparkling with diamonds.


-  Anton Chekhov
And I know others will appreciate this:

"Most people never feel secure because they are always worried that they will lose their job, lose the money they already have, lose their spouse, lose their health, and so on. The only true security in life comes from knowing that every single day you are improving yourself in some way, that you are increasing the caliber of who you are and that you are valuable to your company, your friends, and your family." 


--Anthony Robbins 1960-, American Author, Speaker, Peak Performance Expert / Consultant 


Remember this.

Not all people go out and induce as many horrible toxins into their bodies for years on end like *some* people have...

Some people have naturally weak immunities and inclinations to different illnesses/diseases.

No one knows what is wrong yet - and frankly its no one's (ESP. you) business... but I have to say, in honor of the beauty of his soul:

SOMETIMES people almost die from liver failure and the like and it has nothing to do with alcohol or outside substances or anything of the like.


He may be small but he's has to overcome physical and mental challenges that the likes of many people could not survive.


And he has...

So yes, I'm sorry but some may display a public hatred and desire to rid themselves of things/people/situations (which aren't even *truly* there in the first place - not in the scheme of things outside one's head actually)... 


But when I get multiple emails from someone blaming me for an illness of someone they don't know while said person is calling me a hateful meddling hidden-agenda type person...


You have to wonder how much heart that person actually has.



I would never blame something that could possible kill someone on another person - unless of course it came from your hand.


Insensitive fucks.



Maybe some should blame themselves then whenever someone you like to control falls ill.  THAT is more likely... but I'd never dare email anyoe over and over and say crazy wacked out evil shit claiming that an illness or a death is any person's fault.


So yes, I end with a big FUCK YOU and your ASSumptions... and I pity those that would dare say you have a heart... 


A heart would never strike a woman by blaming her for the health issues of another which has been flooding her mind and her heart and her essence since it was told to her.


No one has any clue of anything.


I am ever_searching... and at times I'm foolish and naive... and blind.

But no one could look here and understand me - anything that's been released here is for me to use as a tool of better understanding in my ever searching journey of self and life... and my ever searching of the humanity of all people and better acceptance of things that I cannot easily understand (for I do not assume to know all... nor will I ever - esp. when it comes to other people).


Your judgments no longer sting.  But I do damn you for your words on a loved one, his illness, and my weakness in that area.


*kick a horse when its down - something that makes a weak man strong*

Is all that is shown when you attempt to sum up people, make conclusions, or only see what you can of your current view from "inside the box"....


NO ONE - not even those of seemingly simple minds can be summed up so quickly of someone with such little experience of that person and be viewed as anything but ignorant.

Ignorant in the definition of the word - not as a term for insult.


However, seeming proud of such ignorance doesn't make anyone look too pretty.



I am smiling... despite the worries of my *real* issues that actually are part of my life... I am smiling... my day is good (better than the morning) - work is nice and it is Friday.


I feel me today.  And maybe people being quick to judge and believe words of angry, unnecessarily threatened-feeling people has really helped me to remember my beauty and my uniqueness.... and the fact that, though frustrating at times, being something more than a person who can be so easily summed up is a wonderfulwonderful thing.


:-)

I HATE the whole pre-pay cell phone plan deal?


I did?


Oh.  Well, let me say it again.




PRE-PAID PHONE PLANS AND PEOPLE THAT RELY ON THEM BUT DON'T KEEP UP ON THEM ARE SOOOO FRUSTRATING....

"I know God promises not to give me more than I can handle. I just wish he didn't trust me so much."

-  Mother Teresa



If would go link the entry if I had time... but alas, I'm 4 minutes late for leaving for my appt. (no specifics in this entry please - open for the quote).



M.T. made me smile with the above.... cute but true.



I love you all.  Please have a Happy Friday and send your vibes of love and healing my way (and the way of him if you can bare to).


Thanks my loved ones.

- Me.

Heal Him.


Take his pain, his illness, his weaknesses.



I will sacrifice.



Take me. Soil me. Whatever.




Heal him please. Just heal him... and take me away.

A trileptal and half an ambien later... THIS is what I feel a need to stumble across my keyboard about.


Pre-paid cell phones.


Good for kids and others who have someone else controlling their account.

But come on people, figure out your allowance for a cell phone bill - go with it... suffer if you go over... but that way you never lost your phone over and over and over.


(and if you have a pre-pay and am reading this - disregard)


It's just friggin' annoying - especially if you are one of those that realizes solely on your cell phone.


Don't get it at all.


Dr. Appt. 8:30am tomorrow.



Feeling the aided sleep finding its way to me slowly now.


*********

Heheh....


I'm a scale of justice with the rising sign of a fish!


I'm having such a good time with one of my loved ones right now... enlightening, comforting, just a good time...



I'M A SCALEY FISH!!!!


which means in part:


"pisces ascendant makes for a highly emotional person who hides their emotions and creates alternative realities or surrealities to deal with them... meaning that if something bad happens, their prone to getting lost inside their head for days on end" - my lisa


WWolfMcRaven: fucking scary accurate, i tell you... astrology is a science, i swear it


I really could agree...


I want to post all of the other things she showed me about me... and maybe about another loved one...

later...  


I just had to giggle when I realized I was a FISH!  And the SCALES!




MOOD:   *goofy/delirious/in awe*
I adopted a cute lil' monkey fetus from Fetusmart! Hooray fetus!

You may write me down in history With your bitter, twisted lies, You may trod me in the very dirt But still, like dust, I'll rise. Does my sassiness upset you? Why are you beset with gloom? 'Cause I walk like I've got oil wells Pumping in my living room. - Maya Angelou

Thank you to those of you who have kept my older co-worker in your thoughts in prayers. I am happy to just receive and share the news that Howard Turner has just come out of surgery and is doing well. He had the cancerous kidney removed (which also included the removal of a rib) and his spleen. They looked again at the spot on the liver but said they are not worried about it (I'm sure they didn't say *that* but this is from Mr. Howard's wife)... He is stable and doing well. We are all very relieved. Glenda (my work mom) will be up in his area for her son's soccer tournament this weekend and wil get to visit him. Which is good because she is a lot like my real mom - very emotional and in touch with loved ones. We heard about Howard 10-15 minutes ago... but I look up (Glenda sits where I can see her) and she's in major tears. Being that we are friends too, I get up and go hug her from behind her seat... worried that she just got some bad news about Howard or something. But they are happy tears caused by a gift given from another lady here that some people misjudge as a "hard ass". Bare in mind that this "hard ass" has tons of animals from fish and geckos to gods (she loves the reptiles though)... Her and I had an immediate connection when I brought pictures of my children here. We swap stories and photos and I have gotten to see a side of her that some others do not see. So when she gets in her "moods", me and some others really do know that its just that. Anyway, Lynn (which is her name) often wears this really pretty Mignon Faget (a pricey jeweler in New Orleans) necklace to work and Glenda often teases her about stealing it and stuff because she loves it. Lynn is blunt - the kind of person who may offend you if you don't know how to realize that she is playing. She always says "you need to get that husband of yours to go out and get you one since you like it so much". I guess she knew that Glenda would either never ask or that her husbnad just wouldn't. Well, holding Glenda - I see an email on her screen... Lynn apparently won at the casino recently... and decided to use her extra winnings for her friend... She bought a present for a friend and told Glenda to look in her drawer. And there it was... a necklace just like the one Glenda loves. And it could've been anything. But wow... My day has been the good day I set out to have from witnessing first hand the ultimate gift - Unselfish love given with no conditions. talk about fate huh? how's that for putting things in perspective? :-)

The sad thing is... I don't *try* to be anything... so how can I be fake. I am just me... and I try to understand that person to the best of my abilities for me... not for you or you or you or you. Just like I write in here for me - not for you... though I often welcome your thoughts, feelings, or whatever what I may be pondering may bring up for you... because I enjoy seeing the parts that make the whole of real people. I don't believe I ever claim to be anything. I don't *try* to be anything. I am not ashamed of my shortcomings and I am not overly impressed with what I may have as personal strengths - they are strengths for me and no one else - though it is wonderful should those strength positively affect another person. Maybe I am wrong here. But I don't try to dress any certain way (I basically wear the same thing ever week) or even fix my hair (ponytails galore!) or try to be anything that anyone wants me to be. If I'm hungry, I eat... I enjoy life as its presented to me as much as I can. I explore life and myself and those around me. Maybe I'm wrong... but fake... Fake to me is the kind of person that has to repeatedly tell you who they are in simple terms "honest" "easy going" "fun" etc etc... why? Who knows... my thought is that in repeating, they are hoping to convince themselves. Yes for whoever may read and wonder what is behind this blog - this is the kind of pondering I do in my journal.... and while its open to those whose opinions I like to read... it is and always has been an outlet solely for me. For I grow and I stretch through my life (I hope to at least) and I realize that that cannot be done with "both eyelids" shut. So I try... but I never *claim* to do anything else. :-) And no - everyone on my lists knows that there is no "tits and ass" here... only philosophies and ponderings of one human mind.

I remember French Quarter Fest time last year... I was very, very ill... something like what I am having now - physically... but a LOT worse. 

Some of you guys may remember... It was like I was dying for about a month.


Boy was a miracle back then if any of you guys can remember.


I'm doing considerably better than that - but it is similar circumstances/illness/symptoms.


That's just so strange to me.  Exactly a year later.  


Same feelings but different.


And no "boy"/"angel".  BUT, insurance which I did not have then... so I do have a Dr. and availability for testing and medication.

I see him on Friday AM.

I'm leaving this unscreened in the off-chance some of the people I cleaned off my list recently were those who would see me on yahoo and send their love via Boy - I may have been really sick and out of it a lot of the time, but I remember the love and I thank you.

Please pray/vibe/whatever it is you do for me if you can.


*hugs*

An incredible lost treasure was found tonight... at the only time that something lost for almost 20 years could have been found. A time when one little piece of plastic and its infinitely valuable contents made the whole world turn right for Charlie's (not the cat, the person he's named after) "little girl". Through the seeming defeat of anxiety can come the most wonderful of fates... a victory of memory remembered, of love forgotten, of doors unlocked... I may be hurting. I may be sick. I may have lost many a precious thing... but the recovery of one - one so long lost... I just wish the other preciousnesses of life could all share together in the love that life's little precious things can bring... and the incredible power of healing held within.
If you find yourself victim of a drive-by cleaning and wished to not be... leave your comment here and the Department of Reinstatement will fix the error asap.

<lj-cut text="'I've got a tale to tell...'">
"I'm engaged to myself - and even that is a little scary."


"I'm a country girl trapped inside a city girl's heart."


"You're like a lizard.  Your outer eyelids are open... but I wonder how open the seemingly transparent, inner eyelids really are..."


"Desperado... you ain't gettin' no younger... your pain and your hunger - they're driving you home."


"James Ingram... You sure are a unique little man."


"I did my best, but I guess my best wasn't good enough... Just Once, can't we figure out what we keep doin' wrong... why the good times never last for long..."


"Sorry Daddy."


"And even if I burn it black, he better say 'Mmmm... I like it like that!'"


"Bitch! Slut! Whore!....darlin'"


"He's harmless, right?"


"I have been what I often call many men - A Jerk."


"Goodnight darlin'."


"If your name is ******, please see me... you've won a free shot!"


"You sure your not lying about your age?"


"Virginia Slim menthols and really tacky hot pink lipstick... bet that's interesting."


"Dancing is a good thing for a sprained ankle - keep it from getting stiff."


"Damn you Denny's!"


"I never saw a picture of him at this age.  He doesn't look happy.  He had a hard life at that age.  His daddy was very hard on him."




"...and you say... Stay."

I am extremely, extremely exhausted this morning.


MUST get actual real sleep next weekend.


MUST.  


ANd must be actually productive in important areas of my current and future life as well.


But for now... MUST put really cold wet rag on my eyes to make them less read and stop feeling so icky.



Eck.  I want my bed!!!!!



Cha-Cha is soooo lovey this morning.  He wants me to call in too.



Poo on responsiblities.

;-P

ERRRRR....  I came here and could smell the seafood from the little shop.


Just went down there.


Sold out.


Ick.


:-(   So I got my Vanilla Coke - and I have my bland-ass turkey sandwich left over from yesterday for lunch.

I don't want to eat it.

Took a diet pill and will enjoy the Coke.  Will probably give in to the ick later on.


POOOOO!!!!!!


Pooey....  I wanted yummy lunch.


:-(

*POUTS*


ERRRRRRR!!!!!

YOU.


In surgery... in biopsy... whatever it is...


Whenever it is...


Your being carried today by a heart that owes you more than can be expressed.

Your carried by a heart that you still and always will own to a pretty great extent.



Whatever it is... whatever comes... 


I'm feeling you.  I pray that it stays safe.


You may be asleep now... Feel me love...  I'm holding you.


You are not alone.


You WILL be ok...  I have faith in that.




YOU ARE HELD.


I am protecting you from afar to the best of my abilities... as I vowed to always do.


Hold your strength and love....



<small>(and maybe, just maybe you might want to tell me its all ok...maybe...? it would not be weak.  livers scare me.)</small>

I just joined a community called <lj user=sexy_dorks>

cause ummm... well, those of you who know me know that's what I am.


But I'm still my latter years hippie too.



Peace my friends,

Me.

"...With a smile on your face And show the world all the love in your heart. Then people gonna treat you better Your gonna find, yes you will, THAT YOUR BEAUTIFUL AS YOU FEEL..." I feel so good right now. I can't explain it. I'm freakin' exhausted... but I feel a peace. Yes, like a late 60's/70's hippie kind of peace. (and no, not dirty - my hair is still wet from my shower lol) I feel happy. If you don't, put your hand on the screen RIGHT HERE. And maybe you can feel the vibe of love I'm sending out to everyone today. Tis my mission. Love, Me.

It's weird... I signed off of my name then visited my calender.


It tells you how many posts I made each day - locked and unlocked... but thankfully - you can only view the subjects of the open ones.


I never noticed that before...


I also notice how much in like the last 2 months my posting has gone WAAAAY up.


*blushes*


ok - random ponder over.

I'm soooo all about the boobage today.


BOOBIES
BOOBIES
BOOBIES
BOOBIES


LOL - I love boobs!


I sound like a freakin' guy, but I do... and I love mine... and I love yours... and hey you, over there... I love your too.


But I love mine the bestest hehe - they filled out just right when I gained some weight...

Moved into a "C" became just the right amount over a handful (at least in my opinion)


Ugh... they are so damn fine....


I'm making myself horny!

AHHHHH!


Help!!!!!


*hehehe*

I have perfect boobies!!! hehe... As if I needed a quiz to tell me... I like looking at them myself.. Another reason why I'd never lose too much weight - my boobs went from nice - to WOAH... I KNOW some of you know exactly what I'm talking about...hehe ;-)

You'll use them to your advantage, if you're wise

Remember that English midterm I was FREAKING out about a couple of weeks ago... Some of you guys sent me love around 3:00 when I was taking it.... welll I GOT AN A!!!!!!!!!!!! Yes indeed... I wish I could tell someone that was really pulling for me at the time... but oh well. I can tell you all and I know some of you guys will be smiling with me as you read this. I really needed to get that test back... I've been having some trouble lately with things, and this grade was a big breath of fresh air that was really needed. So thank you, ALL OF YOU, that wished me luck and sent me good vibes. :-D

Though I don't know who you are. You may be one - you may be many. I do not know why. I feel it strong - I must put it out there. I guess if you feel the reaction of these words than maybe its you that needs them. Something in me or around me is telling me to let you know... You are loved. I love you. If you needed that - then I guess you are why I feel this pull at my heart. If you feel it too - let it wrap itself around you - take it - carry it with you. It may not be my love... It may just be coming through me... It may just be love. But you have it. It is yours. And I am here to remind you (single or plural as you may be).

Much pain in midsection of body.


OWWWWW!!!!!!


*curls up in fetal position under desk*


Damn diuretic type diet pills.

Ick.Ick.Ick.



It's still beautiful today - and so am I...

"Can you move?" "Your alive... If you want, I can fly!" I AM ALIVE! I CAN FLY! I FEEL so light and lovely and beautiful and free (in most ways...) (and no - this isn't the day of bipolars... this is me - now and fully... the other is an expression... why do i try to explain? it doesn't matter if you can't see) WEEEEE!!!! This one is easy... my other favorite movie quoted above (or another fave).... would be.....
